sorcer.service.Revaluation

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.core

      Subinterfaces of Revaluation in sorcer.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  InclusiveContext
      The InclusiveContext is an interface designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request.

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.core.context

      Classes in sorcer.core.context that implement Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayContext
      The Array dataContext has an array like access to a service dataContext.
      class  ControlContext 
      class  ListContext<T>
      ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
      class  PositionalContext 
      class  ServiceContext<T>
      Implements the base-level service context interface Context.
      class  SharedAssociativeContext
      SpaceContext persists its dataContext nodes in a distributed array in JavaSpace with the name provided in the constructor.
      class  SharedIndexedContext<T>
      ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.core.exertion

      Classes in sorcer.core.exertion that implement Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetJob 
      class  NetTask
      The SORCER service task extending the abstract task Task.
      class  ObjectJob
      The SORCER object job extending the basic job implementation Job.
      class  ObjectTask
      The SORCER object task extending the basic task implementation Task.

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.eo

      Methods in sorcer.eo that return Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Revaluation operator.revaluable(Revaluation evaluation, Parameter... entries)
      Makes this Revaluation revaluable, so its return value is to be again evaluated as well.
      static Revaluation operator.unrevaluable(Revaluation evaluation) 
      Methods in sorcer.eo with parameters of type Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Revaluation operator.revaluable(Revaluation evaluation, Parameter... entries)
      Makes this Revaluation revaluable, so its return value is to be again evaluated as well.
      static Revaluation operator.unrevaluable(Revaluation evaluation) 

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion

      Classes in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion that implement Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IfExertion
      The IfExertion implements the Conditional interface.
      class  WhileExertion
      WhileExertion is a new exertion extending from the ServiceExertion and also implements the Conditional interface .

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.security.sign

      Classes in sorcer.security.sign that implement Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SignedServiceTask
      Any task that needs to be saved in a database is sent by encapsulating it in a SignedServiceTask.

    • Uses of Revaluation in sorcer.service

      Subinterfaces of Revaluation in sorcer.service 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Context<T>
      Service context classes that implement this interface provide SORCER generic metacomputing data structures for storage, retrieval, and propagation of heterogeneous information across all SORCER service providers.
      Classes in sorcer.service that implement Revaluation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Job
      A job is a composite service-oriented message comprised of Exertion instances with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
      class  ServiceExertion 
      class  Task
      A Task is an elementary service-oriented message Exertion (with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
